metadata.title: Satellite Characterization of Bio-optical and Thermal Variability in the Sea of Japan

creators.name: U.S. Navy, Office of Naval Research
Bob Arnone, U.S. Naval Research Laboratory, Stennis Space Center.

metadata.description: Use SeaWiFS and AVHRR satellite imagery to further our understanding of physical and bio-optical processes in the Japan/East Sea.
metadata.notes:
